{
    "name": "Bertotti-Robinson spacetime metric with a Schwarzschild black hole and a point charge",
    "abbrev": "BertottiRobinson",
    "description": "The Bertotti-Robinson spacetime metric is a solution to the Einstein-Maxwell equations, describing a black hole with a point charge. It is a spherically symmetric and static spacetime metric.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "SphericallySymmetric",

            "validated": false,
        }
    ],

    ],
